titlestmt.titleproper: Female Bible Association of Spring Garden records 1843-1873
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Female Bible Association of Spring Garden records

bioghist.p: The Female Bible Association of Spring Garden was an auxiliary to the Female Bible Society of Philadelphia. The object of the society was to distribute bibles to those not able to afford them, and to provide their surplus funds to the Female Bible Society of Philadelphia.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains two minute books of the Female Bible Association of Spring Garden, 1843-1851 and 1851-1873. Minutes record routine business and list numbers of subscribers, numbers of families visited and found "destitute of bibles," and numbers of bibles distributed. Both volumes include the Association's constitution and by-laws.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
